about_the_game:
Help donate to the future of Team Syukino in order to help advance the updates of previous games. Also to help fund new ones.


*THIS DLC DOES NOT CHANGE THE GAME IN ANY WAY SHAPE OR FORM.*
detailed_description:
Help donate to the future of Team Syukino in order to help advance the updates of previous games. Also to help fund new ones.


*THIS DLC DOES NOT CHANGE THE GAME IN ANY WAY SHAPE OR FORM.*
legal_notice: Solenars Edge Heroes is the sole property of Syu-Syu and apart of Team Syukino.
name: Solenars Edge Heroes- Small Donation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: DLC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: DLC

short_description: Donate to help advance Team Syukino's future!
